data.comment: The match has started.
Goias take a 1-0 lead thanks to Vinicius Lopes.
Penalty! Marielson Alves Silva points to the spot, great chance for Santos...
In the minute 18, David Duarte (Goias) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marinho scores from the spot and Santos draw level at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 25, At Serra Dourada, Sandro has been yellow-carded for the home team.
He's off! Arthur Gomes is shown a red card.
Thiago Larghi is making the team's first substitution at Serra Dourada with Victor Andrade replacing Daniel Villalva.
In the minute 44, Victor Andrade (Goias) has received a yellow card from Marielson Alves Silva.
Marielson Alves Silva will wait an extra 10 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Daniel Bessa is booked for the home team.
In the minute 45, Goias make their second substitution with Daniel replacing Sandro.
The second-half is underway at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 54, Own goal! Jefferson scores in his own net to make it 1-2.
David Duarte in Goias has been yellow-carded a second time by Marielson Alves Silva and is being sent off.
Para for Santos has been booked by Marielson Alves Silva and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 70, Madson is on a sub for Kaio Jorge for Santos.
The away team replace Marinho with Marcos Leonardo.
Goal! Santos extend their lead to 1-3 through Marcos Leonardo.
In the minute 78, Santos's Marcos Leonardo has been booked in Goiania.
Yago Rocha is replacing Edilson for the home team.
Thiago Larghi (Goias) is making a fourth substitution, with Mike replacing Vinicius Lopes.
In the minute 85, Goal! Victor Andrade pulls one back for Goias to make it 2-3.
Jean Mota is replacing Lucas Braga for Santos at Serra Dourada.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Goiania.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Marielson Alves Silva blows to end the match. The final score is 2-3.
The away team have replaced Felipe Jonatan with Wagner Leonardo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Cuca.
